## hpr3471 :: The Sony Walkman WM-F41

 This episode is just a quick talk about one of my favorite legacy audio devices, my Sony FM/AM cassette Walkman, model WM-F41.
Links

Sony Walkman WM-F41
Behringer Xenyx 502 Mixer
Music is from Kimiko Ishizaka's The Open Art of Fugue: https://music.kimiko-piano.com/album/j-s-bach-the-art-of-the-fugue-kunst-der-fuge-bwv-1080, used by permission of its CC0 1.0 Universal (CC0 1.0) Public Domain Dedication license.
